dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.
dependencies.name: py-docutils

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.
dependencies.name: py-pygments

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Runtime is designed to
enhance energy efficiency of applications through active hardware
configuration.
dependent_to.name: geopm-runtime

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
dependent_to.name: geopm-service

dependent_to.description: Elephant is a package for analysis of electrophysiology data in Python
dependent_to.name: py-elephant

dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox

description: Create tabbed content in Sphinx documentation when building HTML.
name: py-sphinx-tabs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
